trans-unit.source: Would you like to remove '{0:friendName}' from your friend's list?
Please connect to the Internet before adding/removing friends.
{0:friendName} is not playing {1:gameName}.\nWould you like to invite him/her to play this game?
{0:gameName} servers are currently unreachable. Please try again in a short while.
You need to connect to Facebook to add friends. Connect now?
Facebook friends list permission is not given. Please reauthorise it in Facebook.
Your boosts can be applied to a koi from the Koi Details screen. Would you like to select a koi and apply now?
Would you like to restore your game?
Boosts must be applied to a fish currently in the pond. Please take a fish into the pond before buying this boost. Would you like to go to your Koi List now?
Your new boost will be applied to your Koi currently in the pond. Would you like to go back to the Pond now?
Tap to copy the player ID below and paste it somewhere safe.
Your new koi will be delivered to your Koi list. Would you like to go to your Koi list now?
Your new koi will be delivered to your Inbox. Would you like to go to your Inbox now?
There is no connection to the Server at the moment. Your new Koi will be delivered as soon as we get a connection again.
You have no free space in your Koi list at the moment. Please ascend or release one of your existing Koi to free up a slot before buying a new one.
You now have an additional free slot in your Koi List.
Would you like to buy an additional slot in your Koi List?
You cannot give away your last koi!
Cannot hatch while another egg is in the pond.
Cannot hatch while a potential mate is in the pond.
You cannot give away this Koi, it was a gift!
You cannot give away this Koi, it has been given away too many times (and is feeling a bit unloved).
You cannot release your last koi!
There was a problem processing the gift. Please try again later
You already have a Koi of this pattern and colour in your Koi list, are you sure you wish to buy another?
You are about to purchase a random common {0:patternName}.\nThe colour combination given will be random.\nDo you wish to proceed?
You are about to purchase a random rare {0:patternName}.\nThe colour combination given will be random.\nDo you wish to proceed?
This egg will be permanently removed. Do you want to release egg?
This koi will be permanently removed. Do you wish to release this koi?
Cannot connect to game server. Please check your internet connection and retry.
We've encountered an error. We're going to fix it as soon as possible, but in the meantime, tap 'ok' to refresh your game and take you back to the last saved state.
Please wait for your parents or guardians to approve your purchase.
This egg is ready to hatch
Your egg has been added to the egg list. Your egg list is now full. You will not be able to add more eggs until you hatch or release some. Do you want to go to the egg list now?
To get a new egg, you must have an active internet connection. Your egg will be available when your connection is restored.
You must connect to Facebook \nto receive gifts from friends
Your inbox is empty. \nSend koi to your friends \nto prompt them to send some to you!
Cannot connect to {0:socialPlatform}. Please try again later.
{0:gameName} is turned off in iOS Settings, Facebook. Please turn it on and try again.
Higher agility means your koi can make sharper turns, and also lunge at targets from further away.
Higher rarity increases the chance that rare colours will be passed on to your offspring.
Allows you to swim faster and improves your chances of catching the faster targets.
Some files are taking longer than usual to load.\nPlease tap retry to reload the game.
Your new koi will added to your koi list. \nDo you want to see your koi list now?
This koi will be permanently removed from your inbox. Do you want to remove this koi?
Choose a friend to give this koi to.
Your friend's Inbox was not found. The fish could not be delivered and has been returned to you.
Your friends inbox is full. The fish could not be delivered and has been returned to you.
This Koi's Level is now too high for it to be gifted. The fish could not be delivered and has been returned to you.
Your friend has not unlocked this pattern yet. The fish could not be delivered and has been returned to you.
The Koi has been gifted too many times. The fish could not be delivered and has been returned to you.
You may be offline. If the koi cannot be delivered – it will be released.
Only level {0:maxLevelFishCanBeGifted} or lower koi can be gifted!
Do you need any help, or would you like to rate us?
Would you like to go to the Koi Shop\nto see the Collector's Koi list now?
Ascend your koi into a dragon and earn dragon points!
Collect gems to expand your pond
How to eat at a faster rate?
What is the point of this game?
You have eaten enough to craft a gem! Let's get crafting!
By leveling up, you have earned new Ability points. Let's go spend them!
Tap once on a prey to chase them
Try tapping once on a prey to chase them
In App Purchase data not available. Please try again in a few minutes.
In App Purchase not enabled. Please upgrade your Google Market app to the latest version.
Please connect to the Internet for In App Purchase.
In App Purchase not enabled. Please enable it in Settings, General, Restrictions.
In App Purchase not initialized. Please contact the developer.
{0:gameName} servers are currently offline. Please try again in a short while.
Synchronising with server. Please try again in a moment.
This mobile app contains in-app purchases. In-app purchases cost real money and are charged to your account. To disable or adjust the ability to make in-app purchases, adjust your device settings.
Sorry, there are no videos to\nwatch at the moment.
Invite more friends to \nplay and to gift koi.
Boosts the agility of you current Koi in the pond, by 5 points, for 5 minutes.
Boosts the speed of you current Koi in the pond, by 5 points, for 5 minutes.
Make a copy of this common Koi and add it to your Koi List.
Make a copy of this rare Koi and add it to your Koi List.
Hatch your egg instantly using pearls.
Gain a new random Koi (level 1). It will be placed in your 'inbox'.
Gain a new random rare Koi (level 1). It will be placed in your 'inbox'.
Unlock more Koi slots so you can have more Koi in your game to play with.
Boosts the agility of you current Koi in the pond, by 7 points, for 15 minutes.
Boosts the speed of you current Koi in the pond, by 7 points, for 15 minutes.
You have reached the limit of this attribute for this koi. No more points may be allocated.
Your new koi will be delivered to your Inbox.
Please read our Terms of Service
You are about to Activate the final portal. This will remove any koi mate that might be in the pond. Do you wish to continue?
Your Koi egg is about to hatch!
Login using Amazon Game Circle to save your progress. You can restore it if you lose your game.
Login using Game Center to save your progress. You can restore it if you lose your game.
Login using Google Play Games to save your progress. You can restore it if you lose your game.
We are not responsible for any loss of game progress. Logging in to your social accounts will allow us to save your game.
Your egg has been added to the egg list.
This egg will be permanently removed. Do you want to release egg?
You have no more slots in the egg list
You now have an additional free slot in your Koi List.
Please download the latest version from the Amazon App Store.
Please download the newest version from the Google Play Store.
Please clear the browser cache and reload the game.
Please download the newest version from the AppStore.

As a welcome gift to new players, you may receive a limited edition patterned Koi from us. We are dedicated to making this an awesome game so if you have any comments please tap on the 'Support' button in the help screen.
You have no more free slots in the koi list. Would you like to unlock one?
You do not have enough Dragon Points.
You need {0:pearlsNeeded} more pearls. Would you like to get more?

Zen Koi gives away free pearls when you watch video ads. On some devices, those ads need to be stored temporarily on the external memory card. For that to work, please allow Zen Koi permission to 'access photos, media and files'.
Thank you for watching a video.\nYou have earned {0:pearlsEarned} {1:pearlsOneOrMany}.
Would you like to watch\nanother video later?
means Koi is in your collection
{0:increase} pearls have been added to your total.
Unfortunately something went wrong with the purchase. Please let us know what you were trying to buy and we'll look into it immediately.
All your game progress will be erased, including your pearls purchased, and your game will restart from the beginning. Are you sure?
Sign in with a different account
Can't find your game? If you have more social accounts, please sign out in Settings screen and login to a different social account.
Any game that has been played in the last 5 minutes will not be shown here.
The '{0:patternName}' dragon collection is now complete.
Your koi has ascended to a dragon.
You do not have any Dragons yet.\nAscend a Koi to attain a Dragon.
New data is available and your game is being updated. Press 'OK' to continue.
Clearing cache frees up space on your device. Files may redownload when needed. Your progress will remain saved on our servers.
Please sign into Game Center from iOS Settings, Game Center.
Could not connect to Game Center
Please sign into Game Circle from Settings.
I have ascended a new {0:fishName} to become a dragon.
Please free up some space on your device in order to share this image.
Cannot connect to social account. Please try again later.
Your money's safe. Please try again.
There is no connection to the Server at the moment. Please try again when you have a connection.
No mate will come if your eggs list is full.
Congratulations \n your koi has gained a level.
Your koi is now an adult \n it can now breed.
Your koi has reached \n maximum level.
The server is taking a while to respond. If you still don't receive the pearls after a few more minutes, please send us a support message through the support button in the Help screen.
You have unlocked a\nCollector's Koi pattern.
You need to craft more gems
You need to catch more prey
Catch prey, craft them into gems,\nactivate the symbol and expand the pond
You have added\nyour friend to {0:Zen Koi 2}
You cannot release your first koi.
You have not confirmed purchase on a previewed decoration. Please buy it before selecting another decoration.
Collect {0:targetEssence} essence with dragons to unlock the Decorations shop.\nCurrent essence: {1:currentEssence}
You can now buy decorations with this essence.
Collect {0:targetEssence} essence with dragons to unlock the Essence shop.\nCurrent essence: {1:currentEssence}
The Awaken Orb has already been deducted. You have not collected all the Essence. Are you sure you want to exit the Dragon Realm?
I'm playing '{0:Zen Koi 2}'. Would you like to join me?
Collect {0:targetEssence} essence with dragons to unlock My Pond.\nCurrent essence: {1:currentEssence}
You need {0:essenceNeeded} more essence. Would you like to buy some essence?
The decoration has been purchased successfully.
{0:number} essence has been added to your total.
Please connect to Facebook to view your friends list.
Your local cache for {0:Zen Koi 2} has been cleared.
The server is taking a while to respond. If you still don't receive the decoration after a few more minutes, please send us a support message through the support button in the Help screen.
The server is taking a while to respond. If you still don't receive the essence after a few more minutes, please send us a support message through the support button in the Help screen.
You do not have an Awaken Orb to wake your dragon, you get more Awaken Orbs over time, and by ascending your koi.
You have unlocked a new decoration.
Tap 'ok' to refresh your game and take you back to the last saved state.
Earn Dragon Points by ascending Koi and completing collections.
Earn Awaken Orbs by ascending Koi or through daily rewards. Use them to awaken your Dragons.
It seems like you have not achieved the required award in the original Zen Koi.
We did not find any matching games from the original Zen Koi
This is a non-purchasable decoration.\nYou cannot buy more.
Please sign into Game Center from iOS Settings, Game Center, before trying to claim this special reward.
Find any {0:requiredCount} treasures in a flower
Give a Koi to a friend
Accept a Koi from a friend
Gather {0:requiredCount} more Essence to unlock My Pond
In-app Purchases are not enabled. Please go to Settings > Screen Time > Content & Privacy Restrictions > iTunes & App Store Purchases and switch In-app Purchases to 'Allow'.
{0:decorationName} will be switched out and stored away.
This is a single purchase decoration.\nYou cannot buy more.
